resources.string: Instructions: Add new options with ADD. *Hold* and drag each option to indicate your order of preference, with your favorites at the top. Then, select VOTE.
Enter a name for your group
Average Ranking works by averaging the rank that all voters give to each option. The Option with the lowest average rank will be chosen as the winner.

Instant Run-off voting works by counting votes for everyone\'s first choice. The option that fewest people choose as their first choice is eliminated. Then, the process repeats and counts votes for each voter\'s favorite among the remaining options, eliminating on option on each repetition. The winning choices is the last remaining option.
Please enter the name of the option
